entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who is frightened of heights and has been enslaved by her master.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wizard who is questioning Winky about the wand she stole.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a Death Eater who has been enslaved by his master and is now free to seek him.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison for wizards where Crouch was held captive.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of wizards who have turned their backs on their master and are making sport of Muggles.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is questioning Winky about the wand she stole.
Crouch was a Death Eater who turned his back on their master and was enslaved by him.
